title: 1v1 Faker vs Bjerg in First Bracket?
body:
TBH I don't think either of them might make it to face each other in the 1v1 Final or whatever round

So just make it happen in the FIRST ROUND of the bracket

replies.body:
it confirm that you must pick champion that can farm to win, not support champ please

YOU WILL GET OUT FARM AND LOSE LMAO

Looking at the bracket it would have to be the finals but wouldn't it be that much more epic if it was faker vs bjerg in finals?

1v1's are pretty crazy though with blind pick into counters and the possibility that one move can end it. The finalists could realistically be anyone in the tournament.
I'd rather watch Froggen vs Faker in Round 1 tbh.

I want to watch a 1v1 of both player that wants to go in for kill

Not a Korean Killer going after a EU runaway 

Just saying but Froggen isn't really that Hype
The winner of that match will probably win the tournament. I'd like to watch that.
